doc:
Charita Bauer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charita_Bauer 0 Charita Bauer (December 20, 1922 – February 28, 1985) was an American soap opera radio and television actress. Born in Newark, New Jersey on December 20, 1923, she began her career at the age of eight as a model for clothing ads. Her talents included singing, playing the piano, and speaking three languages. Charita_Bauer ( December_20_,_1922 – February_28_,_1985 ) was an_American_soap_opera_radio_and_television_actress . Born in Newark , New_Jersey on December_20_,_1923 , she began her_career at the_age of eight as a_model for clothing_ads . Her_talents included singing , playing the_piano , and speaking three_languages .
